description: Bobbi Starr is a new mid level manager at her company. She has witnessed things not normally allowed at other companies she has worked for and has a few questions for her HR director. "Can I fuck at work? Can I submit to you & have you spank & fuck my ass?" Mistress Matisse has seen this before & is very happy to oblige her by having her come back after hours...
title: Strange HR request. "Can I fuck at work?"
